show_name: Doraemon the Movie: Nobita and the Steel Troops: The New Age
other_title: Doraemon y la revolución de los robots (Spanish)
Doraemon: Nobita and the New Steel Troops - Angel Wings
Eiga Doraemon: Shin Nobita to Tetsujin Heidan - Habatake Tenshi-tachi (Japanese)
映画ドラえもん 新・のび太と鉄人兵団 ～はばたけ 天使たち～ (Japanese)
電影哆啦A夢：新·大雄與鐵人兵團 (Chinese (Taiwan))
電影多啦A夢：新·大雄與鐵人兵團 ～振翅吧 天使們～ (Chinese (Hong Kong))
plot: In a distant galaxy, a robot society plans to invade Earth and take humans as their slaves. A robot named Riruru is sent ahead as a scout who will make the necessary arrangements for the invasion to occur. Luckily for human race, Nobita accidentally interrupts this reconaissance mission. Nobita and his friends will then need to somehow face an entire army of steel troops and stop the mechanized offensive.
ending_theme: "Tomodachi no Uta" (友達の唄) by Bump of Chicken
